labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Allemagne', 'Norvège', "États-Unis d'Amérique", 'Services de télécommunications', 'Utilitaires'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Norvège']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Allemagne', 'Grande-Bretagne', "L'Espagne", 'Finances', 'Technologie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Allemagne', 'Grande-Bretagne', "L'Espagne", 'Technologie']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ["L'Irlande", 'Singapour', "L'Espagne", 'Cyclique Biens et services de consommation', 'ETF'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ["L'Irlande", 'Singapour', "L'Espagne"]

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Belgique', 'Canada', 'Grande-Bretagne', 'Énergie', 'Services de télécommunications'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Belgique', 'Grande-Bretagne']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Belgique', 'Allemagne', 'Norvège', 'Cyclique Biens et services de consommation', 'Finances'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Belgique', 'Allemagne', 'Norvège']
